# Brazilian Academy Award for Best Film

The Brazilian Cinema Grand Prix for Best Film, given by the Ministry of Culture (2000–2001) and the Brazilian Academy of Cinema (2002–present), honors the year’s best Brazilian film and is annually announced at the Brazilian Academy Film Awards ceremony.
